class.name: RichTextLabel
class.description: Rich text can contain custom text, fonts, images and some basic formatting. The label manages these as an internal tag stack. It also adapts itself to given width/heights. Note that assignments to [member bbcode_text] clear the tag stack and reconstruct it from the property's contents. Any edits made to [member bbcode_text] will erase previous edits made from other manual sources such as [method append_bbcode] and the [code]push_*[/code] / [method pop] methods.

method.name: add_image
method.description: Adds an image's opening and closing tags to the tag stack.

method.name: add_text
method.description: Adds raw non-bbcode-parsed text to the tag stack.

method.name: append_bbcode
method.description: Parses [code]bbcode[/code] and adds tags to the tag stack as needed. Returns the result of the parsing, [code]OK[/code] if successful.

method.name: clear
method.description: Clears the tag stack and sets [member bbcode_text] to an empty string.

method.name: get_line_count
method.description: Returns the total number of newlines in the tag stack's text tags. Considers wrapped text as one line.

method.name: get_tab_size
method.description: Returns the number of spaces associated with a single tab length. Does not affect "\t" in text tags, only indent tags.

method.name: get_text
method.description: Returns the raw content of [member bbcode_text].

method.name: get_total_character_count
method.description: Returns the total number of characters from text tags. Does not include bbcodes.

method.name: get_v_scroll
method.description: Returns the vertical scrollbar.

method.name: get_visible_line_count
method.description: Returns the number of visible lines.

method.name: is_meta_underlined
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the label underlines meta tags such as [url]{text}[/url].

method.name: is_scroll_active
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the scrollbar is visible. Does not block scrolling completely. See [method scroll_to_line].

method.name: is_scroll_following
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the window scrolls down to display new content automatically.

method.name: is_selection_enabled
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the label allows text selection.

method.name: newline
method.description: Adds a newline tag to the tag stack.

method.name: parse_bbcode
method.description: The assignment version of [method append_bbcode]. Clears the tag stack and inserts the new content. Returns [code]OK[/code] if parses [code]bbcode[/code] successfully.

method.name: pop
method.description: Terminates the current tag. Use after [code]push_*[/code] methods to close bbcodes manually. Does not need to follow [code]add_*[/code] methods.

method.name: push_align
method.description: Adds a [code][right][/code] tag to the tag stack.

method.name: push_cell
method.description: Adds a [code][cell][/code] tag to the tag stack. Must be inside a [table] tag. See [method push_table] for details.

method.name: push_color
method.description: Adds a [code][color][/code] tag to the tag stack.

method.name: push_font
method.description: Adds a [code][font][/code] tag to the tag stack. Overrides default fonts for its duration.

method.name: push_indent
method.description: Adds an [code][indent][/code] tag to the tag stack. Multiplies "level" by current tab_size to determine new margin length.

method.name: push_list
method.description: Adds a list tag to the tag stack. Similar to the bbcodes [code][ol][/code] or [code][ul][/code], but supports more list types. Not fully implemented!

method.name: push_meta
method.description: Adds a meta tag to the tag stack. Similar to the bbcode [code][url=something]{text}[/url][/code], but supports non-[String] metadata types.

method.name: push_table
method.description: Adds a [code][table=columns][/code] tag to the tag stack.

method.name: push_underline
method.description: Adds a [code][u][/code] tag to the tag stack.

method.name: remove_line
method.description: Removes a line of content from the label. Returns [code]true[/code] if the line exists.

method.name: scroll_to_line
method.description: Scrolls the window's top line to match [code]line[/code].

method.name: set_meta_underline
method.description: If [code]true[/code] will underline meta tags such as the [url] bbcode. Default value: [code]true[/code].

method.name: set_scroll_active
method.description: If [code]false[/code] the vertical scrollbar is hidden. Default value: [code]true[/code].

method.name: set_scroll_follow
method.description: If [code]true[/code] the window scrolls to reveal new content. Default value: [code]false[/code].

method.name: set_selection_enabled
method.description: If [code]true[/code] text can be selected.

method.name: set_tab_size
method.description: Sets the current tab length in spaces. Use with [method push_indent] to redefine indent length.

method.name: set_table_column_expand
method.description: Edits the selected columns expansion options. If [code]expand[/code] is [code]true[/code], the column expands in proportion to its expansion ratio versus the other columns' ratios. For example, 2 columns with ratios 3 and 4 plus 70 pixels in available width would expand 30 and 40 pixels, respectively. Columns with a [code]false[/code] expand will not contribute to the total ratio.

method.name: set_text
method.description: Clears the tag stack and adds a raw text tag to the top of it. Does not parse bbcodes. Does not modify [member bbcode_text].

members.member: If [code]true[/code] the label uses BBCode formatting. Default value: [code]false[/code].
The label's text in BBCode format. Is not representative of manual modifications to the internal tag stack. Erases changes made by other methods when edited.
If [code]true[/code] the label uses the custom font color. Default value: [code]false[/code].
The text's visibility, as a [float] between 0.0 and 1.0.
The restricted number of characters to display in the label.

signal.name: meta_clicked
signal.description: Triggered when the user clicks on content between [url] tags. If the meta is defined in text, e.g. [code][url={"data"="hi"}]hi[/url][/code], then the parameter for this signal will be a [String] type. If a particular type or an object is desired, the [method push_meta] method must be used to manually insert the data into the tag stack.

signal.name: meta_hover_ended
signal.description: Triggers when the mouse exits a meta tag.

signal.name: meta_hover_started
signal.description: Triggers when the mouse enters a meta tag.
